description: Bruno Dey was a Nazi death camp guard and is accused of assisting in mass murder.
title: Germany: Ex-SS guard tells Stutthof murder trial 'I want to forget'
title_page: Germany: Ex-SS guard tells Stutthof murder trial 'I want to forget' - BBC News
maintext: At the trial in January a historian testified that Mr Dey was sent to the camp initially as a Wehrmacht soldier and did not join the SS until September 1944. So, it is argued, he could have asked for a transfer to another unit before becoming part of the SS mass murder machine.
